column6:
Bến Nghé Street food Market là nơi đón tiếp nhiều khách Tây du lịch và khác Việt Nam trong và ngoài nước. Bên trong là những món quen thuộc của Tây và Ta nào như là món Thổ Nhĩ Kì, món Mexico, món India. Và đặc biệt hơn thế Bến Nghé Street Food Market có những món đặc sản của 3 miền trên tổ quốc nào là món Bánh Xèo, Bún Bò Huế, Gỏi Cuốn, Mì Quảng, Cao Lầu Hội An, và những món đặc sản khác cho khách du lịch mở mang tầm mắt và 1 phần giúp cho những người tỉnh thành khác trãi nghiệm được nhiều món trên mọi miền tổ quốc và hơn thế là giúp 1 phần giới thiếu món ăn nước mình cho những khách Tây trải nghiệm. Giá thành cũng phải chăng cho khách du lịch qua trãi nghiệm.
Bến Nghé Street Food Market xin cảm ơn
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Ben Nghe Street food Market is a place to welcome many Western tourists and other Vietnamese at home and abroad. Inside are the familiar dishes of the West and Ta such as Turkish food, Mexican food, Indian food. And more specifically, Ben Nghe Street Food Market has specialties of 3 regions of the country, which are Banh Xeo, Bun Bo Hue, Goi Cuon, Quang noodles, Cao Lau Hoi An, and other specialties for tourists to open their eyes and help other provinces experience many dishes in all parts of the country and moreover, help a part of the Western world to experience their own dishes. The price is also affordable for tourists to experience.
Ben Nghe Street Food Market thank you so much

column6:
Chợ họp vào cuối tuần, khá là đông vui. Đối với người nước ngoài, chợ Bắc Hà sẽ mang bản sắc của người dân tộc thiểu số và sẽ rất thú vị. Nhưng đối với mình, chợ gần giống như chợ quê ở vùng nông thôn, chỉ khác mỗi cái là sẽ nghe tiếng dân tộc thay vì tiếng Kinh và thấy nhiều người dân tộc.
Nói thế không phải là không có cái hay. Lên đây mới thấy được Chợ Chó, Chợ Trâu. Trong chợ cũng có nhiều quầy hàng bán đồ thổ cẩm, quần áo và các thứ linh tinh khác. Và đặc biệt là thắng cố!!! Rất nhiều quán ăn sáng bán thắng cố. Tuy nhiên, ngoài những thứ đó ra, mình cảm nhận nó cũng gần giống chợ quê.

column6:
Fantastic, seamless experience throughout from choosing fabrics > measurements > 1st fitting and adjustments > delivery to the hotel.

Choice of fabrics is vast and I chose a Wool / Cashmere suit, linen jacket, herringbone jacket and bamboo cotton shirts.

The staff are amazing and the on-site tailors made alterations whilst I was trying on other garments.

Yaly will deliver to your hotel and they actually beat me back to my hotel following the 1st fitting - even with a number of adjustments needed.

Emily was amazing and definitely recommend asking for her (although everyone seemed great).

This was my 1st experience of getting bespoke tailoring. Now that they have my measurements I’ll be ordering more once back in the UK.

If you’re looking for a good tailor, I would highly recommend Yaly. You won’t be disappointed.

I was guided expertly through choosing the materials, colours and cut, and measurements taken before given a price. I was very happy with the cost, extremely reasonable so I decided to go ahead. I went back in the late afternoon on the same day for a fitting and any adjustments. However, it all fitted perfectly right away. Very pleased with the final product, great quality and craftsmanship. I would thoroughly recommend.

column4: 101 Bùi Viện Pham Ngu Lao Ward, District 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 700000 Việt Nam
column6:
Chỉ cách nhau không đầy 500m trên đường Bùi Viện, P. Phạm Ngũ Lão, Q. 1 (TpHCM), mà chàng họa sĩ trẻ tài hoa Nguyễn Văn Phiên đã quản lý tới 3 phòng tranh khác nhau tại các số nhà 55, 80 và 117, ngay trung tâm của phố đi bộ sầm uất, đông đúc nhất có đông đảo khách nước ngoài cư ngụ.
Vào buổi xế trưa một ngày thường trong tuần, chúng tôi ghé thăm các Phòng tranh Minh Anh này, nơi nào cũng mang một bộ mặt, phong thái tươi tắn sáng sủa, trên tường treo đầy ắp những bức tranh sơn dầu, tranh nước, lớn có, nhỏ có đầy màu sắc, thuộc các thể loại : phong cảnh, chân dung, tĩnh vật........ vô cùng đẹp mắt, hấp dẫn. Bên cạnh giàn giá vẽ, người họa sĩ đang cắm cúi phóng tác những bức tranh phong cảnh tuyệt mỹ của làng quê, những cô thiếu nữ VN trong tà áo dài duyên dáng.... một vài khách hàng nước ngoài đứng ngắm, tấm tắc khen ngợi cảnh trí đồi núi, sông nước hữu tình của giang sơn gấm vóc Việt Nam qua đôi tay nắn nót cây cọ vô cùng khéo léo của người họa sĩ. Một cặp vợ chồng người Pháp chọn lựa bức tranh sơn dầu vẽ cảnh Chùa Một Cột với giá gần 1 triệu đồng VN (tương đương 40 USD), còn nhóm thanh niên Mỹ đang nhờ một chàng họa sĩ trẻ sơn phết lên chiếc nón lá bài thơ các khóm tre, bụi trúc hay cánh đồng ruộng có đôi ba con trâu đang gặm cỏ, xa xa là đàn cò trắng lượn bay ..... mang đầy bản sắc văn hóa VN.
Xem ra, Phòng tranh Minh Anh suốt từ năm 1995 đến nay hiện diện tại khu vực có nhiều khách ngoại quốc cư ngụ như phố "Tây Balô" trên đường Bùi Viện này, ít nhiều đã tạo ra nét văn hóa, nghệ thuật rất riêng cho ngành du lịch của TPHCM.

column6:
An excellent tailor shop with a wide range of high quality fabric offerings. I ordered two suits (one navy three piece, one mid grey two piece) and a pair of linen trousers, all of which were finished to a high quality and with several fittings to make sure they fit perfectly. More generally, everyone there was so lovely, funny and supportive, and it was a really enjoyable experience all round!

For the suit nerds out there like me, Ba Bi uses a full canvas to ensure a good drape and durability (not all Hoi An tailors do this - make sure to check first!). They were also very adaptable in accommodating my more niche requests, so go in with with really clear idea of what you want and communicate with them. In my case, I knew I wanted a traditional English cut (slightly looser and longer), side buckle fastening on trousers and half-break finish at the leg, and they delivered all these very well. They also keep your measurements in case you want to put in future orders.
column7: Số 45 trên 620 Mua sắm ở Hội An

column4: Phường Tân Định Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 70000 Việt Nam
column6:
Điểm cộng: vi trí nằm ở mặt tiền đường Hai Bà Trưng và gần nhà thờ Tân Định nên thuận tiện kết hợp cho chuyến tham quan.
Mặt hàng chủ yếu là vải thời trang và ăn uống. Vải đẹp đủ loại: voan, lụa, bố...giá cả vừa phải. Món ăn khá ngon: súp cua, chè, mì...
Bên cạnh đó, chợ cũng bán đủ loại mặt hàng nhu yếu phẩm cần thiết: quần áo, bánh mứt, đồ dùng gia đình...
Cửa ra vào đều có 1 cái cân đồng hồ công cộng để người mua có thể cân lại để kiểm tra người bán có cân đủ hay không.
Điểm trừ: Chợ chưa có máy lạnh nên sẽ khá nóng nếu đi tham quan vào mùa hè. Một số lối đi khá hẹp do các sạp bố trí khá gần nhau.
Tóm lại, nếu bạn thích mua sắm vải thời trang và ăn uống thì đây là một điểm đáng để tham quan.

column6:
Nhân viên kém nhiệt tình, thái độ phục vụ chưa thực sự đủ để có thể giúp XQ bán được hàng (cho khách trong nước). Chúng tôi xem sản phẩm mà không có bất kì sự hỗ trợ nhiệt tình nào từ phía nhân viên dù thấy khách vào, muốn biết gì thì phải tự đi hỏi, các bạn có hướng dẫn lên lầu xem thêm sản phẩm trưng bày nhưng chỉ dắt khách đi tới nửa đường thì để khách tự đi. Phía trên lầu không mở đèn, đi ngược xuống thông báo thì nhân viên lại có vẻ bất ngờ vì không biết trên lầu tắt đèn, khóa cửa và không có người trực

Chưa kể, tranh trưng bày còn bị gắn nhằm tên tác phẩm, khi chúng tôi hỏi đến vì thấy sự khác biệt giữa ý nghĩa bức tranh và tên tranh thì nhân viên mới đổi lại. (Tác phẩm Hương Sen lại bị gắn tên Viễn Xứ?).
Sẽ như thế nào nếu hình ảnh của XQ trong mắt khách hàng trong nước chỉ là vu vơ, khi những người bạn nước ngoài hỏi chúng tôi về sản phẩm tranh thêu XQ thì liệu sẽ có lời tán dương nào được thốt lên ở đây?

column6:
Lusi Tailors - Hoi An

We were pleasantly surprised by our experience with luci Tailor’s. Our tour guide informed us that the city was popular for tailors, we walked into a store which was located close to the old town. The first question we asked was if the clothes could be prepared in under 24 hours, and they assured us that that was possible, we then went on to negotiate a good price and we were satisfied with that. My husband ordered three suits and a vest. He was measured and his suits turned out perfect the following day. I also purchased four suits for my daughter who is not traveling with me. We FaceTimed her, and then had her measure her self and communicate, the measurements back with us. The sales people at the Tailor’s walked her through proper measurement guidelines. They had several books for samples, and they had really good material, lining, and our skirts and jackets were well tailored with lining material. Jackets came with the handkerchief. the next day we went in for fitting, I felt that the arm pit was a little tight on the jacket and they were able to adjust it a few hours later, and had it delivered to our hotel room. Overall, I am very satisfied and we received tailored clothing at a very affordable price. All the prices are open to negotiation, and the more you purchase the better pricing they provide you. The staff was very pleasant very professional spoke English well, always served us with cold water, and escorted us to the ATM for safety. The store had cameras everywhere. the ssles people are all family members and the factory has 40 tailors working around clock to deliver the clothes. Fabric quality is really important and this shop carries a large selection of fabric options and colors. If you tell them the weather, you are typically wearing these clothes they will help you pick out the right blend so that you’re comfortable in whatever you are wearing.

column4: 71, Thủ Khoa Huân, Phường Bến Thành, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 700000 Việt Nam
column6:
Không chỉ khách du lịch ghé thăm TPHCM không thôi, mà ngay cả thân nhân của tôi hiện đang công tác làm việc ở nước ngoài cũng rất ấn tượng, hài lòng về những bộ đồ được đặt hàng tại Nhà may TUYỂN nổi tiếng trên đường Thủ Khoa Huân, Q. 1 (TpHCM), từ bộ veston lịch lãm tới những chiếc áo chemises dài, ngắn tay thời trang hay áo khoác, áo đầm phụ nữ thanh lịch cũng đều được may đo vừa vặn, sắc sảo, đẹp mắt qua từng đường kim mũi chỉ, cách đơm khuy nút, đánh bọ.... làm hài lòng khách hàng. Do người thân của tôi vốn là khách quen, nên từ số liệu kích thước lẫn kiểu cách, sở thích....... Nhà may đều đã lưu sẵn, do đó chỉ cần đặt may trong đôi ba tuần, không cần thử lại, là đồ đã được gửi ngay tới địa chỉ người nhà của tôi cách xa nửa vòng trái đất. Tôi đã gặp tại tiệm may TUYỂN một vài trường hợp khách hàng người ngoại quốc muốn tự tay mình cầm về nước những bộ quần áo ưng ý, nên đã đề xuất Nhà may hoàn thành gấp trong đôi ba ngày và cũng được Chủ nhân chiều lòng. Tùy theo loại vải, thời gian may đo thì giá một bộ veston tại Nhà mayTUYỂN không dưới 230.USD/bộ và áo sơ-mi vào khoảng 40.USD/chiếc.
Với đôi tay chuyên nghiệp cộng với kinh nghiệm lâu năm trong nghề cũng như hiểu ý khách của Chủ nhân, nên Nhà may TUYỂN là địa chỉ quen thuộc luôn được khách du lịch trong ngoài nước tìm đến để có được những bộ đồ thời trang vừa ý, mà giá cả lại phù hợp với từng loại khách hàng khi đến tham quan TPHCM.

column6: I was recommended Canali by my hostel in Hoi An. My initial experience was great. All of the women in the shop were incredibly friendly and helpful. I decided on six short-sleeve collared shirts. Only in town for a couple of days, I was assured that my shirts would be ready without issue. I came back the next day at our scheduled time and some additional adjustments were needed - I asked for the sleeves to be shortened and the chest on each shirt needed to be brought out, as the shirts were all much too tight. I came back later that night and one of my shirts was out and ready to be tried on. The shirt fit well and the sleeves had been adjusted. I was told that all of the shirts were ready to go. Shame on me for not checking each shirt. Upon arriving back home, I went to try on all of my other shirts and it was very apparent that the adjustments had not been made to any of the other shirts. I had to pay someone in my home country more than the initial cost of all of the shirts for alterations. I tried reaching out to Canali, but received no response. I would hate to think that I was intentionally deceived, but what was seemingly a great experience has turned out to be incredibly disappointing and costly.

Se acercó la chica, le dije que viajaba al día siguiente y me dijo que me podía tomar las medidas y que su familia se pondría a coserlo inmediatamente. Eran las 16:00, me dijo que volviera a las 18:30, volví a la hora indicada y ya estaba hecho mi vestido!!!! Y lo mejor: lo hicieron tan bien que NO tuvieron que retocarlo!!
Impresionante!!! Y la chica majísima!!

column4: 39 Tran Hung Dao Street, Hội An 0510 Việt Nam
column6:
We learned about Tina Design from our tour guide in Hue. She said it was a family business, very high quality, more about superb tailoring than Hoi An fame. We walked over on our first night in Hoi An, just to check it out. I thought I might get a new suit.

Thinh, Linh, Hiểu, and Tina herself were wonderful. We trusted them immediately, and enjoyed spending time with them. We trusted their advice and understood we were in the hands of masters.

Five days later I had four new suits. My wife bought a suit and a blazer, and our daughter bought a dress for her graduation ceremony - all perfectly tailored with multiple visits to ensure we were happy. They were quite busy every time we visited yet they made us feel special and valued.

The shop is just outside the ancient town, across from the Hoi An Museum. If we have any regrets it's that we didn't get even more...

column4: 62 Phan Tình Cửa Dại Beach, Hội An 0510 Việt Nam
column6: I wanted to have some clothes made whilst staying in Hoi An and after doing some homework in England I emailed a few tailors with my requirements. One stood out in their response and it was the one only 15 minutes walk from my hotel, The Palm Garden. Upon arrival I went and met Minh. What a stroke of luck. This was a small family run business and not one of the bigger tailoring stores in the town centre, it meant that I wasn’t one of many customers and I was personally welcomed by Minh and his lovely family. We got down to business and discussed what I was looking for…two shirts, a pair of trousers and a very complicated Harris Tweed wool coat of my own design. We discussed the fabrics, details and prices for all…no pushy sales, no need to negotiate just very reasonable prices. I agreed to come back I two days for a first fitting. Well, when I did return, I was blown away. The quality was amazing and so much better than I have experienced from other tailors both in Asia and in England. We finessed each item, adjusting sizing and further details. When I went back to collect I was so impressed that I ordered more shirts and more trousers, ending up with 4 pairs of trousers, 5 shirts and the coat! I even did a last minute shirt order that was turned around in a day. I cannot fault the service I received, Minh and his family went out of their way to make me feel very welcome, from the warm smiles, hotel collections and drop offs, wonderful conversation and accommodation of my tricky requests! I really cannot recommend highly enough and if I could give 10 stars I would. If you are in Hoi An there is no better place to go. If you want quality clothes and fantastic service then look no further. My measurements are now on file and I’ll definitely be ordering again!

Tôi là người Hội An,đã nghe và đã biết về dịch vụ may đo nổi tiếng của Hội An nhưng đây là lần đầu tiên tôi sử dụng dịch vụ này do yêu cầu cá nhân.

Thật khó tin khi mọi thứ gần như vừa vặn,chỉ cần làm chiều dài quần ngắn hơn 1cm.Tôi được thông báo là cần 30 phút để chỉnh sửa.Mọi thứ thật hoàn hảo trong hơn nửa ngày.Tôi rất hài lòng về chất lượng sản phẩm và dịch vụ tại An Việt.

column4: 273 Nguyễn Duy Hiệu, Hội An 560000 Việt Nam
column6: Vorab - ich vermute wir sind einfach an die falsche Mitarbeiterin geraten. Uns wurde Sun von einer einheimischen Hotelmitarbeiterin empfohlen. Wir haben uns zwei Hosen, zwei Hemden und einen Mantel fertigen lassen. Die Beratung war lustlos, nicht wirklich hilfreich und auf Effizienz getrimmt. Anschließend haben wir den Preis verhandelt. Dieser war letztlich in Ordnung, aber die Verhandlung eine Qual. Das kann man vernünftiger lösen. 24h später haben wir eine Anprobe vorgenommen und hatten Änderungswünsche. Die Mitarbeiterin hat uns nicht eigenständig auf mögliche Verbesserungen hingewiesen. Jeder Änderungswunsch wurde zunächst versucht zu relativieren und wegzudiskutieren. Letztlich wurden die Änderungen aber doch nach unserem Wunsch durchgeführt. Das Ergebnis: Qualität und Schnitt ist nun gut und zufriedenstellend. Mit einer qualitativ besseren Beratung hätten wir aber sicherlich noch bessere Produkte bekommen (ein abgestimmtes, zufriedenstellenderes Design). Sun cloth shop war wegen der Empfehlung unsere erste Anlaufstelle. Wir haben uns im Anschluss in anderen Geschäften noch weiterer Kleidung fertigen lassen. In diesen war die Stimmung wesentlich besser, die Beratung professionell und die Änderungen wurden eigenständig von der Schneiderin vorgeschlagen. Weil wir wissen, dass es wesentlich professioneller zugehen kann, zwei Sterne Abzug.

column4: 479 Cửa Đại Cẩm Châu, Hội An 560000 Việt Nam
column6:
Toan and her daughter are incredibly lovely and provide a wonderful service with good attention to detail. It cost me just over 1million vnd (around 35 UK pounds) for a custom, floor length gown that was made to measure and incorporated exactly what I asked for when I brought my ideas in to them.

The shop is small, so you might have to wait a while if they are busy with customers, but it is worth the wait as they are a family-run business who are very good at what they do.

The only suggestion I have for first time visitors is that you should go there as early as possible on the first day of your stay so that they have time to make alterations to your clothing if needed especially if you have a particularly complicated design in mind. my dress was made very quickly (around 48 hours) and didn't need many alterations after the first fitting, but since my friend was having a dress made that was pretty complex, it took them longer to get back to her, which made it a rush to pick up on the last day of our trip. This was by no fault at all of the shop's owner or staff though, as they were very kind and amenable to my friends requests and our circumstances.

10/10 I would definitely visit again!

column6:
Perfect fit custom shoes and sandals at an unbelievably low price!
I was sceptical that they could actually deliver on what they promised as I could not believe a custom pair of leather shoes could be made for me in less than one day. But true to their word, not only did they deliver as promised, the shoes were better than expected!
Highly recommended for an amazing fit and comfortable quality pair of shoes.
column7: Số 149 trên 620 Mua sắm ở Hội An

column6: Outstanding service from the team at Vanda. I had made an appointment before my visit (highly recommend you do this to ensure you get the service the staff want to provide) but we were a little early and Hué offered us water and showed us the fabrics available whilst she finished working with the current customer. I wanted some tailoring with my own material and also with theirs, and the process and explanations were through and clear. Returned twice more to complete the fittings - they were keen to ensure the tailoring was correct with their own fabric before starting with mine, which was a nice touch - and the owner hand delivered to our hotel on our last evening. Considering the amount we ordered (lots of shirts, two suits, shorts and a blazer) the turnaround time was amazing, without any of the important parts of the process feeling rushed. It is a little out of town (30min walk from centre of old town or a quick Grab) and not the cheapest in town - but the tailoring is being done right beside where you are ordering and getting measured, which means you really are getting a personalized service. On one of my visits, alterations were made whilst my friend had his fitting - that’s service you don’t get in many of the tailor shops in Hoi An. Overall I’m delighted with the service I got for what was a very fair price. Huge thanks to all the staff but especially Hué.
column7: Số 178 trên 620 Mua sắm ở Hội An

Just book it.

column6:
We had been walking around Hoi An walking into various tailors looking fro a place where I could have a suit made and my partner could have a couple of dresses made. It was hot and we were just about to resign ourselves to a place that we had found earlier that we were fairly happy with and go and get a beer when I decided to just walk into this place for some reason. Vy was very helpful straight off the bat but was more than happy to allow us to walk away and consider whether we wanted to commit to her store. We did eventually return and we were both very glad we did, I ended up having a 3 piece suit made and a linen shirt and my partner bought 2 dresses in the same style. We did have a couple of items made by some other tailors in Hoi An however by comparison of the finished product, professionalism, customer service and our satisfaction this place took the cake. Vy has my measurements and I plan on getting some things tailored and sent to my home.

Max.

column6: I had a wonderful experience getting to know the shop owner, Hanh, and ordering several items of custom clothing here. Frankly, I walked in at first out of curiosity because we were staying in a nearby hotel. At first, I placed a very small order for a pair of pants and a shirt. The clothes were produced quickly, and after trying them on, I was so pleased that I ordered several more pair of pants, more shirts, and a nice custom fit jacket. Of course, your measurements will be taken exactly, so the clothes are an exact fit for your body. I was very pleased with the styling choices made with regards to the clothing. And also I got to choose the fabric and the colors, of course. Of all the items I purchased, the pants are my absolute favorite. Hanh created a pair of what I call adventure pants that are made out of an attractive stretchy fabric and have several zippered pockets. They are really great and I prefer them over any other pants in my wardrobe. In fact, I purchased at least four pair, and I have intentions of ordering more! They look great, or a perfect fit, and are comfortable all day long. You can’t really ask for more. And it was a real treat to get to know Hanh, and learn more about her story. It is a pleasure doing business with someone like Hanh.

column6: We visited Annie and her family last year to order several custom made items, like a woman’s bag, toiletries bag and sport bag for my husband. We had special wishes for in special the toiletries bag, and Annie was very helpful to make our design work. She speaks good English so it’s easy to communicate. They delivered such a good job the first time that we ordered more for our family at home. And because of our family was very surprised of the great quality leather as well, we even ordered again from our home in the Netherlands. Annie send it all to us in the same quality we brought home :) We really recommend this shop.
column7: Số 162 trên 620 Mua sắm ở Hội An

column6: Ahn was able to make 8 dresses, 2 shirts, 4 shirts and a pair of pants in just a couple of days. All high quality. She was also really helpful with organising other parts of our Hoi An trip, getting us a good rate for bikes to hire, airport transfer and meals! I would definitely recommend you go to To To when in Hoi An!

column6:
Le due sorelle che gestiscono questa sartoria sono simpatiche e gentilissime. Siamo davvero molto contenti dei vestiti che hanno realizzato per noi. Il loro contributo è stato importante per scegliere le migliori stoffe e i dettagli - hanno ottimo occhio e ottimo gusto! Il prezzo è buono e la consegna puntualissima.
Se visitate a Hoi An, è un peccato non farvi fare un vestito. E se volete farvi fare un vestito, andate da Bi Bo!

column6: Beautiful pillow covers for a good cause. Also made from recycled materials. Whatever you buy you will be reminded of the children you helped and the goodness in people around the world. It is shop like these that bring people together and make you realize we are human and global citizens.

We got multiple shirts, pants and a dress made to size - all made very fast, with a detail and care. We couldn’t be happier. GO TO THIS PLACE TO HAVE A CUSTOM CLOTHING MADE!!!

Unfortunately thereafter we didn’t receive any message, definitely no shipment, no explanation – in spite of many efforts to reach them.
This is most unfortunate, as several years ago my wife had a nice dress made there.
Something inexplicable must have happened –

column6:
We’ve visited Mekong Quilts in their various locations across Vietnam and Cambodia over the last 10 years. Many quilts and home furnishings later we returned to HCM city to the only current store open. Covid-19 has really set this wonderful organisation back, but they are fighting back.
All products are produced by women in poor rural communities and are of the highest standards Why not use your spending power in HCMC to both support women in need and purchases a lasting gift

column6: I have ordered many suits from Gia Hung and she never disappoints. She provides super-fast service and the quality of the tailoring is exceptional. She also made a tie for me out of the same fabric as my tie, brilliant! My wife also ordered 2 dresses to be made and they fitted her fantastically. Every time I visit Hoi An I try to order something from her as the attention to detail and cost are brilliant. When in Hoi An, this must rate as one of the best fabric shops to visit. She has moved upstairs now and is on the second floor. Ring the bell or call her on +84 (0)903574816, she speaks very good English!

column6: Tôi và gia đình tôi có dịp viếng thăm đô thị cổ Hội An vào mùa hè này. Gia đình tôi được bạn bè giới thiệu nên đến thăm quan một cơ sở thủ công mỹ nghệ nơi mà tôi có thể tận mắt chứng kiến các cô gái thêu những tấm tranh nghệ thuật tuyệt đẹp và tôi có thể xem cách con tằm nhả tơ, để lấy được tơ phải trải qua nhiều công đoạn. Ở đây, các cô gái rất là thân thiện, niềm nở chào đón chúng tôi và tận tình giới thiệu cho chúng tôi để chúng tôi thăm quan. Sau khi thăm quan chúng tôi đã quyết định mua 1 số sản phẩm bằng lụa về làm quà cho người thân. Chúng tôi rất hài lòng về phong cách phục vụ lẫn chất lượng sản phẩm ở đây. Bạn nên đến đây để tham quan và mua sắm, một nơi không thể bỏ qua khi bạn đến khu phổ cổ Hội An.

ベトナム産カカオ豆を使用した、オリジナルチョコレート専門店。
友人や会社へのお土産を買いに寄りました。

パッケージがカラフルで、お土産にぴったり。
6個、12個、24個セットを購入すると、箱の色と同じ紙袋もつけてくれます。
試食もおいてくれているので、試食をしてから購入できるのもうれしい。
箱も紙袋もしっかりしているのに、見た目よりは安く購入できます。
日本語を話せる店員さんもいて、お買い物もしやすかったです。
お土産用に購入するのにオススメです！

板チョコ　32,400VND(約200円)
6個入りBOX　54,000VND(約330円)
24個入りBOX　172,800VND(約1,050円)

Ordered a two piece outfit, they were extremely friendly and the first day the owner already came off a bit rude and charged my card without informing me about the extra bank fees. It seemed like she couldn’t wait to just get the money. The clothes I made cake or okay, the pants were extremely large but fixed the next day. When I went to pick up my clothes after alterations, the other staff that worked there were kind but the owner was extremely rude and did not even greet me back. Not sure if she was upset with me for some reason or just in a bad move.

I would suggest going to tailors opposite or keep looking there I much better customer service around other stores with better quality clothes.

column6:
We got excellent service and really good quality clothes for a good price at Sen Tailor. Anna, the owner, is super helpful and is a fluent English speaker so it's easy to request custom designs and be specific about tweaking details. We got 2 x 3-piece suits which came with an Egyptian cotton shirt, ties and hankies. As well as a dress and trousers which they made based off of pictures we showed them. All of the clothes were ready for the first fitting within 24hrs, which was very impressive and they were very willing and helpful in making changes that we wanted.
Overall we really recommend and would use Sen Tailor again!

column4: 39 Tran Phu Str, Hoi An Town, Quang Nam Province, Hội An 51000 Việt Nam
column6:
The tailors here do excellent and quick work, but as some others have said, be prepared for the staff members’ brusqueness. There is a large variety of fabrics to sort through, and a range of catalogs that you can go through if you need/want to for details or for general ideas. The staff asks an excellent amount of questions to ensure they are making exactly what will suit you -- in my case, many details I had not thought of -- and will happily provide suggestions if you are stumped (as I was a few times).

I would come back for the quality of the work, despite the lack of warmth from the staff.

column6:
確かにこの店だが、店員も違えば評価内容の通りでもなかった気がする。落ち着きなく、商魂たくましいにもほどがあるを越しているおばちゃん店員がいて、あれこれとガンガン勧めてくる。受け取りに行った際も、もう一個、靴はどうか、大きめのバッグはどうか、安くするから・・と言って来る。持ってたバッグをもうちょっと大きめにと言って採寸してオーダーしたのに、数ミリ程度しか大きくなってないなど、若干違う部分があったがこういうデザインだと言って誤魔化す。
皮を選ぶ際、汚れや傷があったりで気になったが、その部分はさすがに使わないで作ってくれてた。展示品のいくつかはシミの付いたものもあったりするが、見て触っていいと思ったものは良い品質だと思う。もともとが凄く安いので文句は言わないが、オーダーは期待値が高いので外れた時にあれ？ってなるので質の良い展示品をディスカウントして買った方が無難かも。

Very cool store. You need to get over the "rudeness" idea. Understand the culture. Be polite. Be patient. Understand that they may prejudge based on previous westerners.
If you are sincerely interested in buying something they're very helpful. They aren't friendly or warm and fuzzy. But they are nice enough. I recommend this store. Really great posters and other real cultural merchandise. Not crap. I bought 2 posters and a lovely water puppet. Good prices and they put the posters in a tube and wrapped my merchandise for transport.
They even allowed me to take a few photos of the posters after that.

column4: 04 Cua Dai Street, Hội An 0000 Việt Nam
column6:
I come to this tailor when I come to Hoi An. I first saw her shop in 2016, it was near the Victoria hotel, she made me a dress for my daughter’s wedding which I still wear! Lan is a lovely lady and speaks excellent English so nothing will be lost in translation when you discuss what you would like.
Her shop has moved and is now opposite Boutique Hoi An Resort. The address is: 207 Lac Long Quan, Hoi An. We got a taxi from the Victoria hotel where we were staying. It is only a few minutes drive but too far to walk in the heat. She has a cafe downstairs and her tailors shop is upstairs, it is beautiful and very light and airy (see my photos).
She can make you anything from a simple top (take your old favourite and she will copy it) or take a photo of something you like. I took a photo of a maxi shirt dress I saw Amanda Holden wearing on a tv show and she copied that for $45. It is fabulous and a superb fit. She has a big selection of materials from cotton to silk but has small sample she can get too. She has a selection of garments you can try on for ideas too. My husband has had shirts made and they were an excellent fit. Most things are made in 24hrs.
Lan works very hard and wants to please. She will deliver to your hotel and offered to pay for our taxi back. I would get more made if I had the room in my suitcase. Please support Lan if you can, she is as good as the famous tailor in town but much cheaper.

When I told her that I am leaving at night, she said the item will be ready by 6 pm. Not having anything in mind I ordered a home shirtdress for my elderly mother. The only regret I have that I didn’t go there on my first day and didn’t order more clothes. By the way, they also delivered it to my hotel since I couldn’t pick it up. column6:
洋服のオーダーをしました。
日本語がかなり堪能な店員さんが、非常に細かく対応してくれて、予想を上回る良いものが出来上がって大満足です！

価格は既製品を日本で買うよりも高めですが、好きなものを作れる楽しさはそれを大きく上回ります。

観光初日の昼にオーダー、次の日の午後にフィッティング、その次の日の夕方にホテルに完成品が届く、という流れでした。中日にフィッティングが必要なことを忘れないでください。

生地は私は持ち込みしてしまいましたが、それはNGとのこと。
店内に日本人好みの素敵な生地がたくさんあります。

スタッフは縫製の人も入れて30人ほどとのことで、採寸・接客・縫製・スピード、どれも素晴らしく、ぜひ誇りに思ってほしいなと思います。

I was across the road and I saw the LiMe sign and as someone who love the look and feel of linen I was drawn to have at the very least a look.
There is a range of jackets, dresses, shorts, shirts etc. in a variety of lovely colours on rails all made of good quality linen and you simply pick an item you like and they will duplicate it for you making any alterations to suit your particular taste.
What struck me initially was the pricing. Considering it’s in a touristy area, I thought it must be a mistake. Under 500k Dong for a tailor made linen dress 400k for tailor made trousers….. I was sold.
Measured up in no time, back the next morning for a fitting and collected that evening.
Highly recommended.

column6: Ana is a fantastic tailor and will always work towards what's good for you. We were recommended her by our tour guide and it helped narrow down the many choices in Hoi An. column6: We wanted to get 4 sets of glasses - for each of us while traveling in Da Nang. We researched "great" Optical shops and concluded that we would conduct our business at Khanh Hung Optical. While we emailed our perscriptions and PD in advance, we also took had the free exam onsight to confirm -- Yup, identical, so that is very reassuring. Outstanding service from before, during and after. What is most impressive is their focus of speed. The reading glasses and far glasses for watching TV on the hotel bed were ready overnight for both of us and the computer (short, medium) and everyday progressive (short, medium, and far vision) were prepared in 4 days vs their their promise of 5 to 7 days -- Wow! That is very impressive for people traveling on tight schedules. The selection of frames is impressive, though in my opinion, we had Khanh Hung Optical staff pick out the frames that best suited our faces since that is their business that they really understand. We are very pleased with their selection and the overall results - the low price, the fast service, the super great personalised service -- caring for you as a person. I guess that is why so many other people have highly recommended Khanh Hung Optical - and that is why we recommend them as well. Simply outstanding!

column4: 95 Phan Chu Trinh Minh An, Hội An 560000 Việt Nam
column6:
We were well taken care of here at Bebe tailor! My partner had a couple suits made and I got a few dresses made as well, including a wedding reception dress. They ladies here are thoughtful and very efficient with their work. It was more expensive than I had originally hoped for, but you do pay for the quality compared with other tailor shops in Hoi An. We visited another tailor shop per our host recommendation, and it was no where near as up to snuff. The ladies at Bebe tailor got things right the first time and altered based on our pictures and requests. I recommend knowing exactly what you want and being thoughtful about how you would like things to adjusted. They will provide their expert opinion, but be thoughtful and firm about requesting alterations that feel right for YOU. Simply request, and they will listen.

Overall, definitely pricey, but you pay for quality and it is a lot cheaper tailoring back home! And the customer experience was fantastic. They even assisted with sewing on buttons that had fallen off of cheap shirts we bought elsewhere. So sweet and kind :)

column6:
My wife doesn’t enjoy haggling, so when we read this old review of a souvenir shop that had fair pricing and no negotiation, we walked to where TripAdvisor said it was. But it wasn’t there. Only a pizza place. Then we looked it up on Google and took a Grab taxi there. Only it still wasn’t there.

Then I used WhatsApp to call the phone number on the listing. The woman who answered came and found my wife and I in the old market and walked us to her sister’s shop, explaining she closed her souvenir shop to focus on her wholesale business.

Her sister was very nice and sold my wife so many bamboo bowls and plates that we’ll need an extra suitcase to bring them home.

But... this place is still closed.

column4: 260 Trần Phú Cầu Rồng, Tháp Chăm, Đà Nẵng 550000 Việt Nam
column6:
J'ai découvert la boutique de Hoi An et y ai acheté une robe (2 530 000 dongs, c'est comme à la maison, finalement) que je ne cesse de porter, malgré l'ouverture d'une des poches qui est beaucoup trop petite (erreur de confection).
Mais hier, j'ai découvert le concept store de Da Nang. WOW! Quelle belle boutique!!! Le décor du lieu a été entièrement conçu par un artiste vietnamien et complémente parfaitement les vêtements conçus par une belge, de toute évidence bien ancrée dans la culture vietnamienne. Ses vêtements sont uniques et je serais bien volontier repartie avec plusieurs pièces, des bijoux, des sacs en plus de sandales et chaussures. Encore une fois, j'ai dû ne repartir qu'avec une superbe robe, puisque je dois me limiter quand même un tant soit peu en voyage!
Au final, les pièces sont moins chères qu'à la maison et oh! combien superbes!
Je voudrais tellement pouvoir retrouver cette boutique dans ma ville!

column6: Hôm nay 14 h ngày 11/4 /2022 , tôi sống ở TP HCM mới về thăm nhà mới vừa đặt chân đến chợ Châu Đốc thì gặp chuyện chẳng vui vẻ gì . Ở lối ra số 3,4 có 2 chỗ bán thịt bò kế nhau ,một cô lớn tuổi và một chị gái trẻ . Cô lớn tuổi tự chào khách tự báo giá nhưng chồng tôi lại mua thịt của chị trẻ hơn bán kế bên . Thế là cô lớn tuổi dùng hết bao nhiêu lời tục tĩu lớn tiếng chửi vợ chồng tôi còn nói chồng tôi đã mấy lần hỏi giá rồi bỏ đi mua chỗ khác , trời ạ trong khi đó vợ chồng tôi sống và làm việc ở TP HCM, thế là cả khu chợ đều nghe . Chắc tại tôi sống xa quê lâu quá nên không biết quý định mới của tiểu thương chợ Châu Đốc là ghé chỗ nào là mua chỗ đó không được mua chỗ khác không thì bị chửi bới tơi tả như vậy . column4: 343 Nguyen Duy Hieu, Hội An 51000 Việt Nam
column6:
10 years ago we visited Hoi An and had the most lovely clothes made for us. Fast Forward to 2019 and we went back. Minh Loan is still the most gentle beautiful lady who with her helpers makes clothes for you that make you feel special.
We love clothes from the 1950's, lovely Sundresses made in Linen, Classic Mens shirts in Linen. Cute Heart Necklined Dresses made in English Cotton. I have a mum tum unfortunately and Minh Loan made me tailored work skirts in Italian Fabrics that fit me perfectly and make me feel like a serious grown up. She has an excellent selection of Linen, we splashed out and had a Linen Sheet Set and Duvet cover made for my son. It is the best nights sleep he has had since we put them on his bed.
When you go to Minh Loan, take clothes that you need altering she will make them fit you perfectly again. Take photos of clothing you admire, she will replicate them. It is best to always go with a photo on your phone or printed out so then there is no confusion. Take your old favourite clothing and have made over and over again.
We took in over 20 Family members the week we were there and Minh Loan and the team treated everyone well, they show no judgement at the younger family members requesting short or revealing clothing, they just make it exactly as requested.
I also had some really lovely cushion covers made in a French Antique Fabric I took with me. We are so grateful for Minh Loan tailor shop as come home with clothes and home furnishings that suit who we are not what is in the shops.
Truly it is overwhelming the choice of tailors in Hoi An but do yourself a favour, get a tax to this Tailors, it is off the beaten track, it is a hidden gem. I am not going to mention prices but to say it is extremely reasonable and you will not be disappointed at all. We don't haggle here. We hope you love it there as much as we do. There is also a good shoe shop next door, Minh Loan will introduce you!
She will get you measured up very quickly, you come back to try on the next day usually and there is not much mucking about. If you have a child she lets them sit on the couch, use her wifi, gives them a sprite or a water and it is a very relaxed environment.
You can take your own material or use hers.

column6: This family-run business specializes in providing quality, genuine pearls and exquisite jewelry. The owners make sure that each pearl is handpicked, polished, and selected carefully to ensure that customers are buying the best product. You can find a wide selection of pearls from classic round and oval shapes to more unusual shapes like baroque and keshi pearls. Madame Hien Pearls also offers a range of jewelry from classic pearl necklaces and earrings to more modern designs. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable, and they are willing to help you find the perfect piece for your collection. The store is also well-priced, so you can find the perfect pearl or piece of jewelry at a great price. A visit to Madame Hien Pearls is an experience that you will never forget.

Chung is such a lovely person, she is not pushy like at other tailor shops and is incredibly patient. She provides an amazing service and goes out of her way to match the customer needs and ideas. She gives excellent advice on fabric selection and design. I was attracted to her shop based on one suit and ended up purchasing a range of clothes. Chung is very caring and takes great pride in the work and ensuring a positive experience. When we couldn't find a particular fabric in her shop, she also took me to the market to find what I was looking for.

Thank you Chung and your team, a great experience for me, and my son and daughter, who also had something made for the.

Very Happy faces all around.
column7: Số 237 trên 620 Mua sắm ở Hội An

column4: 52 Phan Chu Trinh Minh An, Hội An 560000 Việt Nam
column6:
We visited Rit tailor off the recommendation of our apartment owner. We originally went to Bebe which is famous in Hoi An however we found the prices to be very expensive and the service wasn’t great, none of the staff seemed that bothered to help.
When we visited rit we were immediately greeted by the lovely owner Oahn, She offered valuable advice and nothing was too much trouble. My husband and friend bought suits for a wedding, 4 work shirts and trousers and the quality of all were excellent.
Oahn has such a great eye for detail and was able to make suggestions and color match the inside lining of the suits perfectly. We were so impressed by the whole experience and loved meeting Oahn who was such a gentle caring lady. We would definitely recommend visiting Rit if you are after top quality tailoring at a reasonable price.
Oahn also saves all your measurements so you have the option once back home to order anything you want making and have it shipped over, a service which we will definitely be taking advantage of in the future.
column7: Số 246 trên 620 Mua sắm ở Hội An

column6: I picked up 2 skirts at this tailors. They were quick to make them (24hrs) and it was cheap. The fabric is thin, so not great for cool climates, but perfect for travelling on aeroplanes and to cover my legs (for certain cultures) while staying cool in hot Asian countries.

je recommande cette boutique.

column6: Binh Tailor is as good as the reviews you can see from before. Based on my experience he exceeds all expectations. Binh Tailor Takes the time needed to deliver you a fantastic suit for you while on your trip to Ho Chih Minh. He hit all the marks of a seasoned and well experienced espoused tailor that I have ever experienced. He was both diligent and meticulous but patient with …well whatever I had going on at the time of a very busy trip. We scheduled 3 fittings that were well organized but not rushed. I felt my wife and I could take our time and not just speed through different fabrics and items that suited what we had in mind. I strongly recommend you see him and his assistant anytime you can for a suit, trousers, and shirts that will make you look and feel great. We are well seasoned global travelers, and he is by far the best tailor I have ever had. I will be ordering future items to include custom shoes. Thanks for everything.

column6:
We were stalked by Thien when we were wandering around Hoi An, chatting to him a couple of times. He said that he had a tailor shop in the Market and to come and check it out. We had a rather bad experience with another tailor in Hoi An, so we thought why not. Very glad we did. It was good fun chatting to Thien and Tam. I was going in thinking I'll just get one pair of trousers, and I came out having ordered two trousers and two dress shorts.
The trousers and shorts fit really well, and are super comfy. No all my other trousers feel as though they are a bad fit!!
No adjustments were required.
A fun and cut post sale story was I told Thien that I needed a phone case. He told me he would take me to a store but at that moment I didn't have the time. Unbeknown to me, he went and purchased one and cycled all over Hoi An trying to find me. It fit perfect, and he gave it to me as a gift. What a nice guy.

column6: I happened to come across Min Thu as I was walking the streets of Hoi An. column6:
An exceptional experience from start to finish. Suits and other clothes made to measure by highly skilled friendly tailors with no hard sell.

Both tailors used to work at a high end tailors in Hoi An before setting up on their own without the high overheads. They were recommended by friends, or I would never have found them as they are off the beaten track for tailors. I cross checked with Google and TA and was pleased to see consistently high ratings. Tailoring compared favourably with suits from Boss, Max Mara and Jaeger but made to measure. I wish I had brought some of my favourite clothes for them to replicate. They also made a suit for my husband and linen clothes. We were very happy with the finished result. From start to finish it took 48 hours. Andy and Fiona came twice to our hotel to check the fit, button placement length and for quality control. After the first fit we ordered more as we could see how good it is. Prices are also fair. Hope to pay a return trip and to order much more.
column7: Số 310 trên 620 Mua sắm ở Hội An

column4: 51 Đường Hoàng Diệu, Hội An 560000 Việt Nam
column6:
Wir gingen bei mehreren Schneidereien vorbei, es hat uns aber zum Glück in diese gezogen.
Die Beratung war absolut top, Thin hat gleich mit uns gescherzt und nebenbei alle Stoffe zur Schau gestellt. Ich habe mich dann für einen Anzug und ein Hemd entschieden, welche beide wie ausgemacht am nächsten Tag fertig waren. Ich wollte beim Sakko noch eine kleine Änderung, welche ohne Probleme gemacht wurde. Aufgrund der sympathischen Art und dem absolut genialen Service ließ ich mir gleich einen zweiten Anzug machen. Obwohl wir am nächsten Morgen abreisen mussten, wurde mir versichert, dass auch der zweite Anzug zeitgerecht fertig sein würde.
Beide Anzüge und das Hemd wurden uns am nächsten Morgen um 0930 Uhr ins Hotel geliefert. Ich bin noch immer sprachlos! 😊
column7: Số 311 trên 620 Mua sắm ở Hội An

column6:
This was among the many tailor shops we came across while exploring the ancient town of Hoi An.
We went in and started talking to the lady whose name is Ha Ni. She was very friendly and professional and through a few back-and-forth questions she gave us a very good idea of the price it would cost us to stitch linen pants and a dress.
There were a lot of pictures of handwritten reviews and posters displayed inside the shop raving about the tailor-made quality clothes and the service. That was a good sign for us to be a little more inclined to consider the shop.
We stitched 3 linen pants of different colors and a crop top and waist coast. The fitting was very good and they finished the job in less than 12 hours. Altho, there was some hidden time you should account for fitting and any alterations you might need.
Ha Ni was very helpful in guiding us to make the decisions and trying on the clothes to see if the fitting was right. She is very helpful and kind.
Definitely recommend you stop by this store when you’re in Hoi An.

column6:

Service was impeccable from recommending the most suitable linen material for my cropped trousers, suggesting how the trousers should fit to my body and accommodating to my alteration requests after the trousers were sewn. Managed to get both trousers done within 24 hours. Highly recommend!

Thanks ladies!

column6: Our visit to the carving workshop was amazing! My 13 year old daughter and I love artistic activities and have always wanted to try carving wood so when we found out there was a traditional workshop in Hoi An we were delighted to sign up 😃 From the moment we arrived we were welcomed by the friendly staff who showed us the galleries and taught us about the history of carving in the area. After exploring the many lovely pieces of art created by local artisans we were introduced to a master carver who assisted us throughout our workshop. We were served delicious refreshing drinks while we discussed the steps of our projects. We selected our wood, picked out a design, sketched our images with pencil and jumped right into carving. Our woodworking master was very patient and helped us whenever we had struggles. The interpreters were very cheerful and answered our many questions about carving and Vietnamese woodworking culture. Once our carvings were finished we were offered the option of painting them with acrylic paint or leaving them natural. My daughter decided to paint her carving and was instructed on the best techniques to achieve the look she wanted. I decided to leave my work unpainted, smoothed the carving with sandpaper and carved my initials on the back. Once our projects were done our interpreter ordered a taxi for us and told us more about art culture in Vietnam. Our finished pieces are gorgeous and we will be so proud to hang them on our wall at home! This experience was very special and we are very pleased 😁 We highly recommend this workshop to anyone who loves art and wants to spend quality time together! Thank you all so much 🙏 We will be back in the future

column6:
We arrived in Vietnam, (Ho Chi Minh) for our 3 week trip with a loose plan of travelling to Hanoi then working our way back to Ho Chi Minh, We had booked the first two nights accommodation, Internal flights and a Halong Bay Cruise. With nothing else booked we contacted Minh and asked if he could organise tours (Meekong Delta, Chu Chi Tunnels, Ninh Binh, Phong Nha Cave, waterfalls, Ba Na Hills, the Marble Mountain and Hoi an). Minh arranged all accommodation, travel, guides, meals and activities to suit exactly what we wanted to get out of the trip. The highlights of this trip where definitely all the great places we visited and the icing on the cake was the Cyclo ride around Hue with Minh and dinner at Banana Mango. The conclusion of our Vietnam visit was made complete by enjoying lunch with Minh in Danang before flying to Ho Chi Minh to get our flight back home.
Huge thanks to Minh, his family and his team for making our trip Awesome.

On trouve des choses étonnantes et très jolies, que nous n'avions vu dans aucun magasin jusque-là. Les bijoux sont splendides, les tenues (classées par ethnie) aussi. Je cherchais quelque chose de particulier et la vendeuse n'a pas hésité à sortir des albums explicatifs de l'ethnie en question pour m'aider. Je reste sceptique sur les pointes de flèches de "l'âge de bronze" soit disant trouvés dans la rivière... mais je ne suis pas une experte. Les 2 vendeuses sont adorables et on passé du temps à nous expliquer à quoi servait les objets ou de quelle ethnie ils venaient. Elles connaissent leur sujet et expliquent avec plaisir.
column7: Số 88 trên 525 Mua sắm ở Hà Nội

column4: 23 Nguyễn Thái Học, Hội An 560000 Việt Nam
column6: We stumbled across this unassuming store in Hoi an old town and were delighted, enchanted and amazed by Uyen and her artistry and craft. She has an incredible array of handpainted silk dresses, tops, skirts and scarves. Uyen and her staff went above and beyond for us during our numerous visits to her store (about 8 in total ) and she created 2 dresses, a uniquely handpainted scarf and table covering for us. WE also bought numerous scarves, beads and tops. The comittment to quality and the artistic process is evident here and it is an artist demonstrating her incredible skill at its best. If you are looking for a unique, authentic and non-mass produced momento of Hoi an then look no further. The spirit of Hoi An and its unique art culture continues to thrive in Papillon Noir - thank you so much Uyen, you are incredible.

column4: 90 Nguyễn Thiệp, Quận 1 Tầng 3, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 70000 Việt Nam
column6:
We requested our private guide to take us to the best shops for lacquerware, she did take us to a couple where the quality was pretty good but the design poor, sort of curio shop stuff. Then I insisted to visit this shop called Nhu Y and she was somewhat reluctant as it was pretty far out of the way but I insisted.
And God it was worth the trip. The shop is located in a private house in a back street pretty far of the center, difficult to find but we discovered here by far not only the very best lacquer work we have seen but also beautifully designed items. The quality of some items is truly stunning, as for instance a big black box with inlaid mother of pearl extremely contemporary in its design, something you would expect to buy in a shop like Hermes for 10 times the price, or more.
The manager of the shop, Mr. Duc, speaks a perfect English and is truly a gentleman. We ended buying 15 or 20 items at reasonable prices for the fantastic quality.
In the shop I fell in love with a huge 2.4 meters X 1.2 meters panel weighing some 50 kilos and decided to buy it and to have it shipped to Europe.
I then found out that Mr. Duc was the most precise person you could dream doing business with, answering my very many emails each time immediatly and precisely. He sent me the pictures of the crate he built with his staff to protect the panel: fantastic! like the NY Metropolitan Museum or the Louvre when they lend paintings. He also organized the shipping and all that at the most reasonable cost.
Our visit to this shop ended as the best moment of our 10 days trip in Vietnam.

column7: Số 89 trên 525 Mua sắm ở Hà Nội

column6: I have been visiting Andy for about six years for tailoring in Hoi An and I am delighted that she has now opened her own business with Judy. Every year I visit to update my wardrobe - so I do not need to purchase anything off the rack at home. Everything is so beautifully finished and suited to my taste, fitted to my body shape and lifestyle. Andy listens and suggest wonderful ideas that suit me. She has an wide array of fabric choice and her prices are very, very reasonable. Judy fitted my husband for shirts and they were perfect and again beautifully finished. If there is something you would like, they will find exactly the right fabric. No high pressure - just a pleasure from start to finish. When I wear my pieces, I receive many compliments and people always ask where I got my clothes from. There are many places for tailoring in Hoi An but this is by far the best choice. Easy to find - close to the market and great restaurants. Avoid the big shops - your money will go further here and you won’t be disappointed. I highly, highly recommend.

column4: 29 Đông Du, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 70000 Việt Nam
column6:
Ordered 3 custom-made shoes. I only have 2. Now, they are completely ignoring my emails.

Summary: I sent a custom shoe back for a refund/exchange. Now, they will not refund my money, won't exchange my shoes, won't even return my shoes, or even respond to my emails. They are keeping both the money and the shoes. I emailed a bunch of times, but they've been ignoring me. I DO NOT recommend you buy anything online or order anything custom. ONLY buy it in store, where they cannot rip you off!

Long story:
About 10 or so months ago, I went to their shop in Vietnam when I visited a friend in Vietnam. I ordered 3 custom made-to-measure shoe with them and gave them my address since I was leaving Vietnam.

It took about 2 months and I got my made-to-measure custom shoes. They did not fit and were clearly 2 sizes small. I remeasured my foot at a local cobbler shop. I paid for the return shipping, which was very expensive. It took another month or so and they sent me my new shoes.

Two of the three shoes were good. It turns out one of the shoes still did not fit. Now, if I bought off the rack shoes at a department store, or if I bought these shoes on a discount/sale, I would probably just wear them. However, I paid over-budget to get custom shoes, fitted for my foot, yet it still did not fit.

I sent the team photos and they asked me to ship back the shoes for a refund/exchange. I sent back the bad shoes. They put me in touch with their co-founder but THEY HAVE BEEN COMPLETELY IGNORING ME.

Please do NOT make the mistake of ordering custom, ordering made-to-measure, or ordering online. If you are in Vietnam, you can check out the store. However, if you don’t live in Vietnam, they might just take your money and ghost you.

Quite expensive, but decent shoes. But, frankly, dishonest company.
I wish I could get my money back, or my shoes. I wish they would respond! Unless you actually visit the Vietnam store and buy something on the spot, PLEASE STAY AWAY!

Vị trí: Nằm sâu bên trong đường N.V.Hưởng, ở 1 khu khá yên tĩnh, đối diện là Khu chung cư Xi Riverview.
✔️ Có chỗ để xe máy bên trong, ko thấy có bảo vệ vì vậy nên khóa cổ xe, giữ FREE.
---------------------
Không gian: Nhìn khá chất, khá hiphop😲 với các khu: leo núi, skateboard & 1 quán ăn khá lãng mạn. Đa phần khách tới đây là foreigner là phần nhiều 👱 👳.
---------------------
Nhân viên: Bạn nữ mập của khu leo núi rất ko thân thiện với người Việt, nhưng lại rất vui vẻ với Tây 😟. Điều đó nhìn thấy rất rõ và khiến chúng tôi cảm thấy rất khó chịu về thái độ ko thân thiện & thiếu nhiệt tình của bạn nữ này💢 👊. Mong ban quản lý training lại giùm😡.

- Mấy bạn n.viên còn lại thì rất ok 👍.
--------------------
Giá: Mình tới đây để leo núi cùng bạn.

- Giá vé: 250k/ 1 người (chơi đc 1 tiếng).
--------------------
Chất lượng: Trò leo núi khá ok, cực đã, cực phê 😊. Đồ bảo hộ rất chắc chắn, có tủ khóa rất an toàn, có luôn cả n.v.sinh để thay đồ 👍 👏.

- Rất thích hợp để thư giãn & luyện tập thân thể 💪 💪 💪.
--------------------
Các bạn có thể tham khảo thêm bên dưới nhé!

column6: My first trip with my girlfriend to Vietnam , the traffic here is so heavy , I don't want to say it is " crazy " . However , we ignored the bad stuff and only thought about exploring Da Nang . We did not go to Ba Na Hills as many friends recommended, we chose My Son Santuary and Hoi An, and the beautiful islands here. Vn's driver was always on time and provided us with cool water bottles, he spoke English to communicate with us , it is ok . I couldn't ask for more from a driver , what he did was always take good care of our trip . Thank you Qua Nhi for always driving carefully.

column4: 2 C-D Phan Boi Chau, Hội An 560000 Việt Nam
column6: We initially went to BeBe tailors to get a dress made each, but thought they were too expensive. Disappointed, we went to the Lantern Lady (to make lanterns) who recommended that we try Silk Town. The prices were excellent! Much less than BeBe, and probably less than either of us would spend on a dress at home, which wouldn’t have been tailored. The staff were very friendly, helpful and patient when we were deciding on the design and fabric. The finished results were stunning! We had two free fittings which was enough to get the dresses we wanted, and we were even entitled for a third. Would highly recommend!

column6:
Last August when our daughter visited us in Vietnam, we took her to Hoi An and discovered Ta Ta Tailor through reccomendations from other expats. In one day, they were able to make 6 casual dresses, 2 jumpsuits, 2 special dresses for a family wedding, 2 mens suits and 6 mens shirts.
Their service was so memorable that when we had more family visit this month, we returned and again, they were able to make 3 mens suits 4 mens shirts, 5 casual dresses and 4 special dresses for another upcoming family wedding. They completed all of these in 2 days and delivered to our hotel before we left! We will never go to Hoi An without visiting TaTa & TiTi! They are always so wonderful to us and our family!

column6: Tôi đến Phú Quốc vào dịp lễ 2-9 cùng gia đình. Địa điểm đầu tiên tôi tìm đến là chợ đêm Phú Quốc với vô số những quán ăn và đặc sản từ hòn đảo này. Điều không thể bỏ lỡ là thưởng thức hải sản tươi sống tại chợ đêm với giá cả tương đối phù hợp . Tuy nhiên nếu muốn mua những đặc sản phong phú của hòn đảo Ngọc này làm quà thì hãy ghé KING MART . Cửa hàng nằm trên đường Lê Lợi ngay tại chợ đêm và bạn dễ dàng nhận ra ngay vì bên ngoài có biển hiệu khá bắt mắt với hình ảnh một con tôm hùm bự khá đẹp . Đặc biệt cô chủ cửa hiệu là người dễ thương tận tình và nếu có lỡ không biết đi đâu chơi gì tại PQ thì cô ấy sẵn sàng làm tour guide cho các bạn nhé.

column6:
I’ve just had three linen shortsleeved shirts made here and I’m very pleased with the results.

I took in a shirt I really like and asked for it to be copied x 3. I chose three separate linen fabrics (linen is a great fabric to wear in the SE Asia climate) and paid a deposit. The shirts were ready 36 hours later and are a perfect fit and so well made. Total cost was approx £50 which I thought very reasonable for the quality and fast turnaround.

Truc did an excellent job and I will definitely visit her again the next time I visit HCMC.

column4: 96A9 Trần Phú, Nha Trang 650000 Việt Nam
column6: Заказывали мужской клатч из кожи крокодила, через Викторию. В наличии то, что хотелось не было, поэтому она предложила изготовить клатч на заказ, было отправлено фото с желаемым клатчем, Виктория обозначила цену, нас она устроила и мы внесли предоплату. По готовности клатча цена удивительным образом возраста, да и сделали не то, что хотелось. Т.к. хотелось клатч из кожи крокодила было решено забрать то, что сделали. А через 2 года эксплуатации, вернее проходил два лета, а лето у нас в Сибири не сильно продолжительное, кожа просто треснула. Поэтому не советую связываться с данным магазином.

column6:
Sorry it's taken me so long to write a review!!

Came here back in Jan, before COVID reared its ugly head properly.

Stumbled into this shop after window shopping/getting various quotes from other tailors in Hoi An.

There is, truly, no shortage of tailors in Hoi An. However, this was the first one I walked into where the service felt completely casual (in a good way) and the lovely woman I dealt with wasn't pushy at all. She completely listened to my requirements to what I wanted and was really helpful too.

Lovely family-run business. Go support these guys. If I ever come back to Vietnam, I'll pop my head back in and say hello :)

column6: Đợt ra Hội An vừa rồi mình vô tình ghé qua tiệm Lee's Quilt, tưởng là chỉ ghé ngang qua xem vì ấn tượng 1 chiếc túi xách tiệm treo ngay cửa hàng...bước vào bên trong tiệm thì mình không chỉ mua 1 túi xách mà còn mua luôn mền, ví, áo sơmi cho ông xã mình. Một chiếc tiệm có nhiều đồ đẹp xỉu, giá lại vô cùng phải chăng. Và không chỉ có thế mình còn phải quay lại ngay ngày hôm sau chỉ vì những cô bạn gái đi cùng chuyến đi thấy thích chiếc túi xách của mình, họ bắt mình phải dẫn họ đến tiệm. Nhân viên tiệm cũng rất nhiệt tình và chuyên nghiệp, không gây cho mình sự khó chịu khi mình muốn thử hàng hay xem kỹ hàng hoá ...Một chiếc tiệm rất đáng yêu và xứng đáng được ghé lại nhiều lần. Mình chắc chắn sẽ quay lại đây thêm lần nữa khi mình có dịp đến Hội An

column4: Làng Rau Trà Quế, Hội An 560000 Việt Nam
column6:
Zen is extremely accommodating, she took me in even though I made my booking last minute. As a solo traveller, I am extremely grateful for workshops like Zen’s that do not set minimum participants rules to conduct classes. Instead, she keeps her class size small to ensure personal attention.

I wanted to make a wristlet, I have an idea of how I want it to look like, Zen came up with the template and other design ideas to improve its aesthetic. Not only was Zen a great instructor she is also a good conversationist. We had a lovely chat while making my wristlet. I am now a proud owner of a wristlet I can brag that I made. I am so happy with this experience and highly recommend it to everyone. It is the best souvenir I got myself this trip.

column4: 48 Lò Sũ Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội 100000 Việt Nam
column6:
We were in Hanoi old town in August and our teenage son was after a tailored suit for 6th form. After looking at a few from the outside, Duc Nhat was our chosen establishment and happened to be about 2 minutes from where we were staying.
Our son was able to easily explain what he was after and we were offered a set price with a first fitting later that day and a finished two piece suit expected the following day.
It was a pleasant environment with plenty of choice of fabrics and materials and we were treated very well with efficient service, care and professionalism.
Our son chose the style, general cut, lining and other details, all guided by our expert host and tailor… measurements taken, all choices made and deposit paid, our first visit left and excellent impression and a big smile on our faces.
That evening, true to his word, the jacket was waiting for a first fit and after a few, skilful movements of the chalk and an expert eye, the jacket was off for alterations and completion.
The following evening, we arrived to find a really lovely two piece suit waiting for us. Duc Nhat was definitely a great choice and we are very happy with the final piece.
The suit then traveled around Vietnam in its own bag for over a week and is now back in the UK, it is clearly well made and skilfully tailored and its new owner is very happy indeed - a very big thank you to Duc Nhat.

column6:
I have visited Bang Da Leathern 3 times now and own 4 pairs of shoes from them. They are absolutely amazing and I wear them all the time! The first time I visited it was a really last minute purchase and they made them for me overnight. The second time I had a pair of over the knee boots made and a pair of ankle boots which are great (I have tiny ankles and so can never get shoes to fit in the UK)

The last time was the most impressive as I didn't actually visit there myself. My boyfriend went to Vietnam in January and he visited the shop for me. The amazing team there sent me a video showing me exactly what measurements I needed to send to them. Then I sent them a photo of the type of boot I wanted and hey presto - they made them in a couple of days. When they arrived in the UK, they fitted like a glove and I wear them almost every day. I cannot recommend them highly enough if you are looking for some high quality, perfectly fitting boots or shoes! Thank you to the team at Bang Da!

column6:
We are Best friends from USA traveling together only for a week, we had decided to go 4 days starting from Saigon to Dalat and did a flight to Danang.

The trip from Saigon up to Central Highland and Dalat was amazing with their guides Mr Sunny and Mr Li who really good took care for whole trip about accomodation, foods, place to see . Can say everything were awesome and we were so happy and enjoyed every minute.

This trip you can be explored all special thing from central highland and historical that haven't to much tourist yet.

They're so great in accommodating good room, good local food and beautiful landscaping.

Thank you so much for great experience for us in Vietnam.
Hope we will do another trip from Dalat to North more days with you.
Would recommend this company to everyone who want to explore Central Highland from Saigon.
Best Regards
From Anna

column6:
Đã được nghe tên thương hiệu Hallelu Chocolate và hôm nay đến thưởng thức từng sản phẩm của Hallelu. Đây là một trong những cửa hàng socola chất lượng tại Việt Nam, toàn bộ sản phẩm không chất bảo quản và nhũ hoá, thành phần dinh dưỡng được làm từ tự nhiên, khẩu vị rất hợp với người trong nước và ngoài nước. Ngoài những sản phẩm socola, son môi socola Hallelu cũng là một sản phẩm rất độc đáo, được chiết xuất từ 100% bơ cacao và dưỡng ẩm rất tốt.
Hallelu Chocolate mang lại một giá trị tinh thần rất cao, câu chuyện thương hiệu được chia sẽ từ anh Founder rất tận tình và ý nghĩa. Không gian bên ngoài của cửa hàng rất thoáng, Hallelu phù hợp ngồi trò chuyện vào các buổi chiều tối và thưởng thức một vài ly hot chocolate, hot cacao, hay cacao tea. Tôi sẽ luôn ủng hộ Hallelu và giới thiệu đến bạn bè trong và ngoài nước của tôi.
Hallelu Chocolate is a good quality store, good service, and good prices

column6: A friend and I came to the cave and spent a hilarious couple of hours getting involved in the sporty and active adventure within the cave. We missed the safety video which in hindsight would have been helpful as we did not know how to successfully stop ourselves as the bottom of the zipline (we both graciously crashed into the mat). We had a lot of fun with our tour guide who helped us get equipped with helmets and torches before we acclimatised to the cold water, swam 10-40m to the cave entrance and hiked in through a muddy pathway. The guide called out when we needed to slow down to get safely through the tunnel. We arrived at a mud bath which was very slippery but the whole group loved getting fully involved in the mud and we had a great laugh all together. If you do not want to get muddy, this trip is NOT for you. Then we went back out for a cold dip and to remove the mud from our bodies and clothing, before kayaking (which was a lot of effort after we had laughed so much) back to the adventure course. This part is optional but we stayed and did a mini zip line, a big dive into the water and a small assault course over the water. A very fun afternoon and well worth the price if you are with a good group of adventurous people!

column1: Gốm Sứ Kim Lan Hà Nội
column6: Thực sự tôi không biết đến làng gốm sứ cổ bên cạnh sông Hồng ,Âu cũng là cái duyên tình cờ , đc người bạn đưa sang ECI oải chơi , do còn thời gian , bạn tôi anh phong rủ vào xem các cơ sở sản xuất , thực sự tôi chỉ biết tới làng gốm bát tràng cạnh đây mà thôi , mày có người bạn dẫn đường chúng tôi đi qua làng hoa Xuân Quan , tới cổng làng gốm Kim Lan , từ ngày đầu làng đã thấy nhiều hộ buôn gốm và cũng có nhiều cơ sở sản xuất ngói xây dựng , tới giữa làng là có ngôi chợ gốm , và chợ dân sinh rất tiện lợi , cạnh đường có vài hộ mang gốm ra bán , như : Cơ sở : làng gốm sứ kim lan , gốm sứ Huệ hợp , gốm sứ hải Huệ chuyên đồ thờ cúng ...mình cũng đc xem nặn gốm bởi nghệ nhân Tên anh Nguyên nữa ạ , làng có cái bảo tàng gốm sứ truyền thống , chứa đựng nhiều giá trị lịch sử tâm linh ....
column7: Số 122 trên 525 Mua sắm ở Hà Nội

column1: Phụ Liệu Da Giày Hiếu Trung
column6: Hồi hè 2015, mình đã mua ở đây 1 túi đeo chéo khâu tay làm sẵn và đặt 1 túi tote to + 1 đôi sandal. 2 cái túi đẹp xuất sắc, còn đôi sandal thì da ok, nhưng đế hơi cứng (cái này chắc do nguyên liệu họ nhập không phải loại tốt nhất). Mình rất hài lòng với 3 sản phẩm và vẫn dùng cho tới giờ. Đặc biệt ấn tượng với bác chủ nhà, rất thân thiện & nhiệt tình với cách. Hè năm nay (2018), mình quay lại để đặt may túi cho cô bạn thân, không ngờ mua thêm được cái túi tote nữa và cũng mua luôn 1 túi tote khác cho cô bạn luôn. Cảm thấy rất thích vì mỗi lần đến đây là mua được túi đẹp với giá rất phải chăng. Highly recommended!

column4: 341B Nguyễn Duy Hiệu, Hội An 560000 Việt Nam
column6:
I recently had a laptop bag made here and it was a fantastic experience. One of the ladies from the store took me on her scooter to check out the leather shops so I could pick the exact roll of leather for my bag. They really went above and beyond to make sure I was happy with my options!

They were very open to making all sorts of customizations (I changed the straps and pockets) and offered great suggestions about what would and wouldn't work with what I had in mind.

I would absolutely buy things from them again!

column1: UKYS - The Best Custom Tailored Suits and Shirts
column4: 31/1Bis Nguyễn Văn Lạc Bình Thạnh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 700000 Việt Nam
column6:
I have been to other tailors in HCMC, None can compare to Mr. Lam and his wife.
On my initial visit which was a Saturday afternoon, they were actually closed but Lam insisted that I go ahead and come in.
Then he dove right into finding out what I needed, once all that discussed he proceeded to take measurements of me in every way possible that you can measure a human body.
The next Thursday I went back for 1st fitting and I knew as soon as I slipped into the Egyptian cotton shirt, everything was going to fit me exactly as I had requested, and I was right, slacks and jacket fit perfectly and super comfy!
I highly recommend UKYS and Mr. Lam
column7: Số 126 trên 522 Mua sắm ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

column7: Số 386 trên 620 Mua sắm ở Hội An

column6:
While staying in Hoi An we met Alex who works for Shop 52. He told us that if we wanted clothes made to come to his shop. We decided it would be fun, so got some clothes made. We were happy with the product, my partner got 3 shirts made, and I got 2 dresses. His shirts were very good price, my dresses were similar price to Australian prices (~$50 a dress) but it’s nice to have a dress fitted exactly to you, and unique! One of my dresses had to be adjusted 3 times but the ladies were very helpful and I was able to get my dress back in 3 days even with all of the modifications, which I thought was very quick! My other dress only 1 day because it fit perfectly!
Alex went above and beyond for us even when there was no benefit for him - he called us taxis when we ran into him on the streets, recommended good restaurants, etc! Thanks guys we will be back!
column7: Số 387 trên 620 Mua sắm ở Hội An

column6: Không nghĩ là trong đây có tiệm Spa luôn. Tiệm barber này khỏi bàn vì giá khá là phù hợp với những dịch vụ siêu tốt ở đây luôn, các bạn có thể thưởng thức cafe và bia miễn phí nữa nè, dàn barber lẫn chuyên viên Spa đầy đặn kinh nghiệm và đa dạng dịch vụ. Các chị cũng không nên bỏ qua chỗ này luôn nha. Tư vấn viên tiếng anh chuyên nghiệp khỏi bàn lại còn thân thiện và hài hước nữa. Du khách nước ngoài hoặc người việt nam mình muốn có một ngày thoải mái khoẻ khoắn thì nên thử vào đây nha mọi người. Highly recomended.❤️😍😍 thanks Rose,Ken,Alex,David, Lam and

column1: It's Happened To Be a Closet
column4: 89 Mac Thi Buoi, District 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 70000 Việt Nam
column6:
Tôi thường đến đây để tìm những trang phụp đẹp, độc... mà hiếm có nợi nào ở TP.HCM có những sản phẩm tương tự. Đây là một shop nằm ở một trong những con đường đẹp, sầm uất và sang trọng ở Sài Gòn. Ngoài những mẫu trang phục, những trang sức hết sức độc đáo và sang trọng, mang một phong cách rất cá tính đến từ đất nước Thái Lan, nợi đây còn có đội ngũ nhân viên rất trẻ, dễ thượng và luôn làm hài lòng bạn, kể cả khi bạn chỉ đến "ngắm" mà không mua sắm. Tôi thích nhất ở nợi này là dịch vụ nail vì có nhân viên phục vụ rất chuyên nghiệp cũng như các sản phẫm, đồ dùng ở đây đều sử dụng những thương hiệu nổi tiếng, lạ mắt và đặc biệt tất cả luôn sạch sẽ không thể chê vào đâu được.
Tôi thực sự rất ấn tượng và thích nơi này.

column4: 6 Công Trường Quốc Tế, Q.3 Room C26, 2nd Floor, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 70000 Việt Nam
column6:
I wasn’t expecting a dewey decimal system but even some basic alphabetisation would have been nice. Instead I had to sift through every single book in the English speaking section. I went seeking either a Stephen King or a Lee Child, two of the worlds most prolific and best selling authors - to no avail. However, if you want one of 12 copies of ‘mr and mrs Smith’ then this is the place for you. After spending so long in there I felt obliged to buy a book just out of politeness - until I saw the prices! I walked out hot, tired and disappointed. 2 mins round the corner is an entire street of new and used book stalls where the staff actually look up from their phones and talk to you. I found everything I needed and more there. I love supporting small book shops but this one is undeserving of any support. Do yourself a favour and give BOA a miss...
I would upload a picture of the primitive collection of extortionate books but as with many 2nd hand stores that know they charge way too much you cannot take photos. They say a picture paints a thousand words - which is about as many as you’ll find in this “bookshop”
